title: Hub-and-Spoke Networks
prompt: A wide-angle photograph of a rural county road at golden hour, with a small critical access hospital visible in the distance on the horizon and a closer rural clinic building in the mid-ground, connected by a thread of asphalt stretching across farmland; photograph from a low angle near road level, capturing the physical and conceptual distance between facilities, with warm amber light casting long shadows and muted green fields creating spatial depth that suggests both connection and separation.
